text: Motion
Director

This scene begins with Mano-chan being approached
by the boy who is the main character.

Mano-chan doesn't realize she's being approached,
so it's okay for you to just walk naturally.
...R-Right...
Co-actor
Ah, Excuse me director.

So, Sakuragi-san's role is that of the type of girl who is popular
with the boys and is always talked about, right?

If that's the case, it might be a little unnatural that she
didn't expect to be approached.
─ I would be happy to hear your opinion, Sakuragi-san...

...I was wondering whether the girl thinks that someone
likes her, or if she doesn't think so herself...

...Right.
That's my thoughts...
Director

I see, I'm okay with Mano-chan's idea
of a kind and modest girl.
Co-actor

Oh, I see... Then i get why
the boy i am playing got angry for getting ignored...

"If I call out to them, they'll notice."
From absolute confidence, I guess.
Director

Right, it's what's commonly referred to as the "me" types,
starting from the negative, thinking you've been ignored!

Mano-chan's character is the type of girl who lacks
self-confidence, so there is a misunderstanding
Co-actor

I understand, Sakuragi-san sorry for interrupting.
Thank you...!

....N-No...
Likewise, thank you very much...

...haha, I'm really the one who should be thanking you
because it was a good conversation starter.

I tend to look scary on first impressions, so I'm trying to
figure out how to talk to people without scaring them...

...i understand.
──U-Um, ...I would be happy if we could talk like this again.
